title: Ben Affleck enjoys a stroll with his mom as Jennifer Garner is spotted in the same neighborhood
text:
He's the doting father of three who he co-parents with ex-wife, Jennifer Garner.

And despite his busy schedule, Ben Affleck proved he still had time for his mom, Christine Anne Boldt while out and about on Tuesday.

The 47-year-old kicked off his morning with his mom during a morning fall stroll around Brentwood, Los Angeles.

Mom and son date: Ben Affleck was spotted enjoying a morning stroll with his mom Christine on Tuesday around Brentwood

Ben rocked a casual blue hoodie and grey sweatpants for the mother-son outing.

He attempted to keep a low profile with dark shades and carried with him a pair of dainty white sneakers, likely for one of his adolescent daughters.

Christine also dressed casually in a black top and pants combo underneath a deep teal cardigan.

Casual: Ben rocked a casual blue hoodie and grey sweats for the mother-son outing

Outing with friends: Meanwhile, the Batman star's ex-wife, Jennifer Garner, was also spotted in Brentwood with company

The mom to Ben and Casey Affleck opted for a burgundy cross-body bag and wore her reading glasses on top of her head.

Meanwhile, the Batman star's ex-wife, Jennifer Garner, was also spotted in Brentwood with company.

The beauty went for a walk with a friend and was looking at the neighborhood houses, according to onlookers.

Casual: Jennifer appeared to be makeup free for the outing with her freind

Stylish: Jennifer rocked a navy blue sweater with a pair of mom-style jeans

Jennifer rocked a navy blue sweater with a pair of mom-style jeans.

She completed her look with white sneakers and kept a low profile with dark round shades.

The Camping actress and Ben began dating back in 2004 after meeting on the set of Pearl Harbor in 2001 and Daredevil in 2003.

Warm:Jennifder finished the outing by giving her friend a hug

Working together: Ben and Jen equally co-parent their children (pictured Ben with Seraphina, 10, in September)

By June 2005 they married in a private Turks and Caicos ceremony. The officiant and his husband were the only guests who attended.

Exactly 10 years on in June 2015, Ben and Jen announced their separation and filed for divorce in April 2017.

Following their divorce, the doting dad lived in the guest house on the side of the property. The pair now live extremely close to each other in their respective new homes so they're both close to the kids.

Their split was finalized in October 2018 and they've continued to amicably co-parent their children, Violet, 13, Seraphina, 10, and Samuel, seven.
description: Ben Affleck was spotted enjoying a morning stroll with his mom Christine on Tuesday around Brentwood. At the time same his ex-wife, Jennifer Gardner was seen walking in the same neighborhood.
